attributes.action: To make the minimum wage tax free, review the position effect this would have
attributes.additional_details: the minimum wage is having a negative effect on the training over 21 due the costs involved,it is also reducing the employers that will employ vulnerable people, employers are reducing the working hours to compensate causing a higher benefit costs,at the same time also making the employees that are between 12.50 ans £15.00 feel undervalued even though the market conditions meaning their wages can’t increase, it has also taken the s/m business control and in some case driving the black market
attributes.background: To review the impact on the economy of the minimum wage was actually a minimum wage and not a minimum wage - tax

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

The standard Personal Allowance is £12,570, which is the amount of income you do not have to pay tax on. If you would like changes to this, you could start a petition about that.
